summary: Two best friends and cop partners become the subject of a beautiful news reporter's documentary. The two soon find themselves competing for screen time as well as the love of the reporter while after a murderous arms dealer.
cast: Stephen Chow|Jacky Cheung|Ann Bridgewater|Eric Tsang|Blackie Shou Liang Ko|Yuen-Chi Fung|Chi-Shing Chan|Fruit Chan|Man-Ho Chan|Shu Gei Chan|Ying-Wah Cheung|Billy Sau Yat Ching|Kin-Nam Cho|Mei-Yan Chow|Michael Dingo|Bruce Fontaine|Deborah Grant|Ivy Kong|Jessy Lam|Andrew Lau|Yuk Kee Lau|Man-Wah Luk|Ging-Cheong Lung|Wai-Cheung Mak|Yun-Sheng Pan|Man Kit Poon|John Sham|Chi-Keung Szeto|Ka-Keung Ting|Barry Wong|Wan King Yeung|Hon-Kan Yip
director: Director: Blackie Shou Liang Ko (as Blacky Shou Liang Ko)
title: Ga lei lat jiu
